column2: Oscar Night:  Recommendations from some of the lower-profile categories
column5: First up:  The Live Action Shorts 3 American films one Israeli and one Palestinian.  I liked the Palestinian film the best -- "The Present."  Next:  The Animated Shorts  Third:  Documentary Shorts  And finally The Documentary Features (I’ve only watched 4 of the 5 — am about to watch the final one:
